[objectbased]

  • Public SplunkPSTool

    Powershell script that provides the ability to download various Splunk Universal Forwarder packages along with the ability to locally install on a local machine.

  • Public ThreatAPIs

    This Python script makes HTTP requests to multiple open source threat intelligence blocklists and aggregates the details together into dictionary objects for further searching.

  • Public Splunk Nix Installer

    Bash script for downloading and installing the Splunk Universal Forwrader on a NIX host.

  • Public ARIN Whois

    Python script for using ARINâ€™s Whois RESTful web service to pull network and organization records. CIDR, Name, ASN, Organization and more.

  • Public Jekyll Website

    Personal portfolio built as a static page created using Jekyll.

  • Private ansible-main

    Collections of ansible playbooks and roles built over the years for software configuration, general automation, and more.
